TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lived , prior to his arrest , in GPE , GPE .

CARDINAL . At TIME on DATE the applicant was arrested on suspicion of manslaughter . After an ambulance had been summoned by the police officers and medical help had arrived , the beatings ceased .

In the expert ’s opinion , the applicant did not sustain any serious physical damage .
